title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 May 2016 - XWiki
content:
<ujjwal> has quit

05:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

10:34 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <inev> has left #xwiki  
12:02 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:03 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:03 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <CylonSputnikk> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <CylonSputnikk> Where do you set what group guests and newly created accounts (from LDAP) get placed into? Its denying guests and new users from the logo file and all spaces  
12:37 <ClemensR> you probably have closed the XWiki space to visitors?  
12:38 <ClemensR> ldap group mapping is explained in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Authentication#HLDAPAuthentication  - except if you use the LDAP App to configure each wiki separately, then there is an UI to do the mapping  
12:38 <ClemensR> otherwise new users end up in the XWikiAllGroup  
12:44 <CylonSputnikk> guests are experiencing the same thing (they shouldn't)  
12:44 <CylonSputnikk> so i must have done something somewhere  
12:58 <ClemensR> where is the logo located? is it appended to a color theme?  
12:58 <CylonSputnikk> its the main logo on the home page. top left  
12:58 <CylonSputnikk> i think the answer to your question is yes  
13:00 <ClemensR> then you maybe have restricted the view right to the space containing the color themes?  
13:00 <ClemensR> last time I checked the "Admin tools" where helpful to track down permission problems:  extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Admin+Tools+Application  
13:03 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:03 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:06 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <vmassol> back on the French soil ;)  
13:18 <CylonSputnikk> do guests go into xwikiall?  
13:19 <vmassol> nope  
13:19 <vmassol> XWikiAllGroup is only for registered users  
13:19 <CylonSputnikk> hmmm  
13:20 <CylonSputnikk> i don't see xwikiguests as a group though. all of a sudden non logged in users get denied permission to my logo and navigation  
13:21 <vmassol> xwikiguest is not a group, it's a user  
13:24 <CylonSputnikk> found it  
13:24 <CylonSputnikk> weird how those perms got pulled  
13:25 <ClemensR> if you add a view right for one group or user it means it is implicitely denied for others  
13:26 <vmassol> CylonSputnikk: there's a new tutorial here: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/AccessRights  
13:26 <vmassol> maybe it can help  
13:26 <vmassol> wait wrong link ;)  
13:26 <vmassol> been moved to doc proper yesterday  
13:27 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Access+Rights  
13:27 <CylonSputnikk> oh. wow  
13:27 <vmassol> actually  
13:27 <vmassol> this is for admins  
13:27 <vmassol> there's also a simpler section for users  
13:27 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/RightsManagement  
13:28 <vmassol> not much there, mostly points to the admin guide  
13:28 <ClemensR> reference is at http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Permission+types  
13:32 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:33 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:33 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:33 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <vmassol> Enygma`: ok to publish http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/DevPracticesByXWikiSAS ?  
14:16 <sagarhani> has quit  
14:17 <Enygma`> vmassol: looks good. You can also see it as a follow-up to my high-level presentation, with more details ;)  
14:18 <vmassol> ok I'll link to it with a sentence good idea  
14:20 <vmassol> done  
14:22 <Enygma`> don`t forget to tweet it from the xwiki.org account  
14:24 <vmassol> done  
14:27 <msmeria> has quit  
14:35 <sagarhani> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <tmortagne> vmassol: "Fine rights management" -> "Fine grained rights management" ?  
15:53 <tmortagne> (but sure it's fine too :))  
15:53 <vmassol> me?  
15:53 <tmortagne> I see you are editing the document  
15:53 <vmassol> I've jsut chaged the heading level + TOC  
15:53 <tmortagne> don't know who started it  
15:53 <vmassol> Caty contributed it  
15:54 <vmassol> but we can all edit  
15:54 <vmassol> she's going to send a mail to propose it  
15:54 <vmassol> in not too long  
15:54 <tmortagne> ok  
15:54 <vmassol> then we need to review  
15:54 <vmassol> make changes we think we should do it to make it more correct  
15:54 <vmassol> and then if we agree we can link it officially on xwiki.org  
15:55 <vmassol> actually it's fine-grained I think  
15:55 <vmassol> fixed  
16:21 <vmassol> I don't think that "\* Rights management: each user registered on a wiki has rights that allow him to create, modify, consult or delete wiki pages." is part of a basic wiki….  
16:23 <tmortagne> vmassol: yep I don't think right management is part of core wiki features  
16:23 <vmassol> ok removing
